speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Thus
               
              far
               
              our
               
              fortune
               
              keeps
               
              an
               
              upward
               
              course
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              we
               
              are
               
              graced
               
              with
               
              wreaths
               
              of
               
              victory
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
But
               
              in
               
              the
               
              midst
               
              of
               
              this
               
              bright-shining
               
              day
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
I
               
              spy
               
              a
               
              black
               
              suspicious
               
              threat’ning
               
              cloud

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
That
               
              will
               
              encounter
               
              with
               
              our
               
              glorious
               
              sun

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Ere
               
              he
               
              attain
               
              his
               
              easeful
               
              western
               
              bed
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
I
               
              mean
              ,
               
              my
               
              lords
              ,
               
              those
               
              powers
               
              that
               
              the
               
              Queen

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Hath
               
              raised
               
              in
               
              Gallia
               
              have
               
              arrived
               
              our
               
              coast

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
              ,
               
              as
               
              we
               
              hear
              ,
               
              march
               
              on
               
              to
               
              fight
               
              with
               
              us
              .

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
A
               
              little
               
              gale
               
              will
               
              soon
               
              disperse
               
              that
               
              cloud

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
And
               
              blow
               
              it
               
              to
               
              the
               
              source
               
              from
               
              whence
               
              it
               
              came
              ;

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
Thy
               
              very
               
              beams
               
              will
               
              dry
               
              those
               
              vapors
               
              up
              ,

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
For
               
              every
               
              cloud
               
              engenders
               
              not
               
              a
               
              storm
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
The
               
              Queen
               
              is
               
              valued
               
              thirty
               
              thousand
               
              strong
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
And
               
              Somerset
              ,
               
              with
               
              Oxford
              ,
               
              fled
               
              to
               
              her
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
If
               
              she
               
              have
               
              time
               
              to
               
              breathe
              ,
               
              be
               
              well
               
              assured

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Her
               
              faction
               
              will
               
              be
               
              full
               
              as
               
              strong
               
              as
               
              ours
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
We
               
              are
               
              advertised
               
              by
               
              our
               
              loving
               
              friends

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
That
               
              they
               
              do
               
              hold
               
              their
               
              course
               
              toward
               
              Tewkesbury
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
We
               
              having
               
              now
               
              the
               
              best
               
              at
               
              Barnet
               
              Field

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Will
               
              thither
               
              straight
              ,
               
              for
               
              willingness
               
              rids
               
              way
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
              ,
               
              as
               
              we
               
              march
              ,
               
              our
               
              strength
               
              will
               
              be
               
              augmented

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
In
               
              every
               
              county
               
              as
               
              we
               
              go
               
              along
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Strike
               
              up
               
              the
               
              drum
              ,
               
              cry
               
              “
              Courage
              !
              ”
               
              and
               
              away
              .
